Articles.Content:
Hey guys today i was working on something i wanted to do since 2012 back in the days when minecraft was my only thing to do all the day .

So i work at a Resource Pack right now, I call it for the moment as Skal Craft 2 : Nausulic Craft. Its name comes from a older texture pack i used to develop (It actually was mostly personal and never make it to MC forum officially but i was going to do it.

Now going to the Kerbal thing i noticed i drawn something similar to planet kerbin, Mun and Minmus

However this was my conceptual art of the planet Nausuros "A planet of islands" In it some of them can be seen (And there's a hurricane forming around!) Naturally it had to get moons to get it way cooler (I used mostly fresh concepts of my past year of school for this, Nausuros sub-system is formed by it and its 3 moons Vesellios biggest and closest, Haulzo (Which is actually a captured planetoid like Ike) And Kaluen (The far blue dot).

What do you guys think? This went much better than what i was expecting here.

Full (Or maybe start of organized work) of this resource pack started today and im trying to get a first edition to october 20, no more related thing may be put unless is more like this .
